title: Bouken shitemo Ii Koro
sinopse:
Young man trying to find a job becomes enticed by the only female staff member to work for an AV studio as a male actor. Antics and comedy ensue as their relationship gradually improves.

Included one-shots:
Volume 11: Ishikawa-senpai Monogatari, Aishite My Hero, Sensei-chan, Ganbatte, Pretty Cute
